languages.text: "Я родился за два сектора отсюда. В довольно влиятельной семье, что позволило мне посвятить себя моей великой страсти — истории архитектуры Империума. Я истратил немало лет на доскональное изучение всех трудов, посвященных этому искусству, а затем, когда вошел в право наследия — путешествовал и документировал развитие зодчества на различных мирах. Пока однажды... о, этот проклятый и благословенный день! Пока однажды мне в руки не попало нечто особенное".

"I was born two sectors away from here. My family was quite influential, which allowed me to dedicate myself to my great passion — the history of Imperium architecture. I spent a number of years studying every scholarly work there was to find on this art, and then, once I had inherited my family's fortune, I travelled and documented the development of architectural thought on different worlds. Until one day — oh, that accursed and blessed day! — until one day I came into possession of something quite special."
languages.original_text: "Я родился за два сектора отсюда. В довольно влиятельной семье, что позволило мне посвятить себя моей великой страсти — истории архитектуры Империума. Пока однажды... о, этот проклятый и благословенный день! Пока однажды мне в руки не попало нечто особенное".

I spent a number of years studying every work there was to find on this art, and then, once I had inherited my family's fortune, I travelled and documented the development of the architectural thought on different worlds. Until one day... Oh, that accursed and blessed day! Until one day I came into possession of something quite special."

languages.text: 「私はここからふたつ離れた星域で生まれました。影響力のある一家のもとで生まれ、そのおかげで帝国建築物の歴史という最大の情熱に自身を捧げる余裕がありました。何年もの間、この芸術に関するあらゆる学術書を研究し、一族の財産を相続してからはさまざまな惑星を旅して建築思想の発展を記録しました。そう、あの時まで…あの呪いと祝福が同時に訪れた、あの日がくるまで！その日、私はある特別なものを手に入れたのです」
languages.original_text: "I was born two sectors away from here. My family was quite influential, which allowed me to dedicate myself to my great passion — the history of Imperium architecture. I spent a number of years studying every scholarly work there was to find on this art, and then, once I had inherited my family's fortune, I travelled and documented the development of architectural thought on different worlds. Until one day — oh, that accursed and blessed day! — until one day I came into possession of something quite special."

traits.locale_text: 「私はここからふたつ離れた星域で生まれました。影響力のある一家のもとで生まれ、そのおかげで帝国建築物の歴史という最大の情熱に自身を捧げる余裕がありました。何年もの間、この芸術に関するあらゆる学術書を研究し、一族の財産を相続してからはさまざまな惑星を旅して建築思想の発展を記録しました。そう、あの時まで…あの呪いと祝福が同時に訪れた、あの日がくるまで！その日、私はある特別なものを手に入れたのです」

languages.text: “我的故乡离这里隔着两个星区。我的家庭有权有势，因此我得以全心全意地投入到我的伟大爱好中——帝国建筑史。我花了数年时间，研究关于这门艺术的每项学问，在那之后，我继承了家族的财富，去了很多不同的世界，记录了建筑思想的发展。直到有一天，噢，那被诅咒但又被祝福的一天！那一天，我得到了某件非常特别的东西。”
languages.original_text: "I was born two sectors away from here. My family was quite influential, which allowed me to dedicate myself to my great passion — the history of Imperium architecture. I spent a number of years studying every scholarly work there was to find on this art, and then, once I had inherited my family's fortune, I travelled and documented the development of architectural thought on different worlds. Until one day — oh, that accursed and blessed day! — until one day I came into possession of something quite special."

traits.locale_text: “我的故乡离这里隔着两个星区。我的家庭有权有势，因此我得以全心全意地投入到我的伟大爱好中——帝国建筑史。我花了数年时间，研究关于这门艺术的每项学问，在那之后，我继承了家族的财富，去了很多不同的世界，记录了建筑思想的发展。直到有一天，噢，那被诅咒但又被祝福的一天！那一天，我得到了某件非常特别的东西。”

languages.text: «Nací a dos sectores de aquí. Mi familia gozaba de cierta influencia, lo que me permitió dedicarme a mi auténtica pasión: la historia de la arquitectura del Imperium. Pasé años estudiando las obras de todos los académicos que existen en este campo y, en cuanto heredé la fortuna de mi familia, viajé y documenté el desarrollo del pensamiento arquitectónico en diversos mundos. Hasta que un día, que maldigo y agradezco a partes iguales, me hice con un artefacto de lo más especial».
languages.original_text: "I was born two sectors away from here. My family was quite influential, which allowed me to dedicate myself to my great passion — the history of Imperium architecture. I spent a number of years studying every scholarly work there was to find on this art, and then, once I had inherited my family's fortune, I travelled and documented the development of architectural thought on different worlds. Until one day — oh, that accursed and blessed day! — until one day I came into possession of something quite special."

traits.locale_text: «Nací a dos sectores de aquí. Mi familia gozaba de cierta influencia, lo que me permitió dedicarme a mi auténtica pasión: la historia de la arquitectura del Imperium. Pasé años estudiando las obras de todos los académicos que existen en este campo y, en cuanto heredé la fortuna de mi familia, viajé y documenté el desarrollo del pensamiento arquitectónico en diversos mundos. Hasta que un día, que maldigo y agradezco a partes iguales, me hice con un artefacto de lo más especial».

languages.text: « Je suis né à deux secteurs d'ici dans une famille très influente, ce qui m'a permis de me consacrer à ma grande passion : l'histoire de l'architecture de l'Imperium. J'ai passé de nombreuses années à lire tous les ouvrages sur le sujet puis, lorsque j'ai hérité de la fortune familiale, j'ai voyagé et étudié le développement de la pensée architecturale dans différents mondes... jusqu'à ce qu'un jour, aussi béni que maudit, j'ai mis la main sur quelque chose de très spécial. »
languages.original_text: "I was born two sectors away from here. My family was quite influential, which allowed me to dedicate myself to my great passion — the history of Imperium architecture. I spent a number of years studying every scholarly work there was to find on this art, and then, once I had inherited my family's fortune, I travelled and documented the development of architectural thought on different worlds. Until one day — oh, that accursed and blessed day! — until one day I came into possession of something quite special."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis né à deux secteurs d'ici dans une famille très influente, ce qui m'a permis de me consacrer à ma grande passion : l'histoire de l'architecture de l'Imperium. J'ai passé de nombreuses années à lire tous les ouvrages sur le sujet puis, lorsque j'ai hérité de la fortune familiale, j'ai voyagé et étudié le développement de la pensée architecturale dans différents mondes... jusqu'à ce qu'un jour, aussi béni que maudit, j'ai mis la main sur quelque chose de très spécial. »

languages.text: "Ich wurde zwei Sektoren von hier entfernt geboren. Meine Familie war recht einflussreich, sodass ich mich meiner großen Passion widmen konnte – der Geschichte der Architektur des Imperiums. Einige Jahre studierte ich sämtliche wissenschaftlichen Werke über diese Kunst, und als ich dann das Vermögen meiner Familie erbte, reiste ich herum und dokumentierte die Entwicklung architektonischer Ideen auf verschiedenen Welten. Und eines Tages – oh, dieser verwunschene und gesegnete Tag! – gelangte ich in den Besitz von etwas recht Besonderem."
languages.original_text: "I was born two sectors away from here. My family was quite influential, which allowed me to dedicate myself to my great passion — the history of Imperium architecture. I spent a number of years studying every scholarly work there was to find on this art, and then, once I had inherited my family's fortune, I travelled and documented the development of architectural thought on different worlds. Until one day — oh, that accursed and blessed day! — until one day I came into possession of something quite special."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wurde zwei Sektoren von hier entfernt geboren. Meine Familie war recht einflussreich, sodass ich mich meiner großen Passion widmen konnte – der Geschichte der Architektur des Imperiums. Einige Jahre studierte ich sämtliche wissenschaftlichen Werke über diese Kunst, und als ich dann das Vermögen meiner Familie erbte, reiste ich herum und dokumentierte die Entwicklung architektonischer Ideen auf verschiedenen Welten. Und eines Tages – oh, dieser verwunschene und gesegnete Tag! – gelangte ich in den Besitz von etwas recht Besonderem."

languages.text: "Buradan iki sektör uzakta doğdum ben. Ailemin sözü çok geçerdi, bu sayede de kendimi en büyük tutkum olan İmparatorluk mimarisinin tarihine adayabildim. Bu sanat dalı hakkındaki tüm akademik metinleri yıllarca çalıştım. Nihayet ailemin mirasına sahip olduğumda da seyahate çıkıp farklı dünyalardaki mimari görüşlerin gelişimini belgeledim. Ta ki bir gün, son derece özel bir şey elime geçene kadar. İşte o gün, benim için hem çok uğursuz hem de çok mübarek bir gündü."
languages.original_text: "I was born two sectors away from here. My family was quite influential, which allowed me to dedicate myself to my great passion — the history of Imperium architecture. I spent a number of years studying every scholarly work there was to find on this art, and then, once I had inherited my family's fortune, I travelled and documented the development of architectural thought on different worlds. Until one day — oh, that accursed and blessed day! — until one day I came into possession of something quite special."
